1560810.name: Hidden Memory - Neko's Life Soundtrack
1560810.description:
Includes all the original songs from HIDDEN MEMORY - NEKO'S LIFE, specially composed for the game by Caue Spuri Lemes de Souza, member of the band DONGO DONGO, in 320 kbps MP3 format.

Now you can enjoy the songs from the game “Hidden Memory - Neko's Life” on your computer at any time.

Perfect for studying, working or just relaxing. Listen directly from your Steam client.

The songs can be directly accessed through the Steam platform or by following the steps below:

... or in the Hidden Memory - Neko's Life - Soundtrack folder in the Steam directory: ... \ Steam \ steamapps \ music \ Hidden_Memory_Nekos_Life - Soundtrack.
